title: Espana Viva [kit]
brief_description: A kit for the “Espana viva” Spanish course for beginners consisting of two audio-cassettes divided into 15 units that correspond to the dialogues in the student text together with pronunciation practice and exercises. Included is a copy of the student text and teacher’s notes.
